MS.S: Requirements:_x000A_- Invoke-Build command is available for calls_x000A_- Internet connection for using online viz-standalone.js_x000A_- or viz-standalone.js in the path, https://github.com/mdaines/viz.js_x000A_- or, when -Dot, dot in $env:Graphviz or in the path, http://graphviz.org_x000A__x000A_The script calls Invoke-Build to get the build tasks, makes the DOT graph,_x000A_and uses either Viz.js or dot in order to convert the graph for show._x000A__x000A_Tasks without code are shown as ovals, conditional and incremental tasks as_x000A_notes, other tasks as boxes. Safe references are shown as dotted edges,_x000A_normal references as solid edges. Job numbers are not shown by default._x000A__x000A_EXAMPLES_x000A__x000A_# Make and show HTML using viz-standalone.js (local or online)_x000A_Show-BuildGraph_x000A__x000A_# Make and show SVG using dot_x000A_Show-BuildGraph -Dot_x000A__x000A_# Make Build.png with job numbers and top to bottom edges_x000A_Show-BuildGraph -Dot -Number -NoShow -Code "" -Output Build.png

Requirements:_x000A_- Invoke-Build command is available for calls_x000A_- Internet connection for using online viz-standalone.js_x000A_- or viz-standalone.js in the path, https://github.com/mdaines/viz.js_x000A_- or, when -Dot, dot in $env:Graphviz or in the path, http://graphviz.org_x000A__x000A_The script calls Invoke-Build to get the build tasks, makes the DOT graph,_x000A_and uses either Viz.js or dot in order to convert the graph for show._x000A__x000A_Tasks without code are shown as ovals, conditional and incremental tasks as_x000A_notes, other tasks as boxes. Safe references are shown as dotted edges,_x000A_normal references as solid edges. Job numbers are not shown by default._x000A__x000A_EXAMPLES_x000A__x000A_# Make and show HTML using viz-standalone.js (local or online)_x000A_Show-BuildGraph_x000A__x000A_# Make and show SVG using dot_x000A_Show-BuildGraph -Dot_x000A__x000A_# Make Build.png with job numbers and top to bottom edges_x000A_Show-BuildGraph -Dot -Number -NoShow -Code "" -Output Build.png
Invoke-Build Graphviz PSScript PSFunction_escape_text PSCommand_escape_text PSIncludes_Function
